quote_first: The sun was now setting. It was
quote_last: in the afternoon when Alisande had begun to tell me who the cowboys were; so she had made pretty good progress with it - for her. She would arrive some time or other, no doubt, but she was not a person who could be hurried.
title: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court
author: Mark Twain

quote_first: “There’ll be twenty pallets’ worth by three o’clock tomorrow, see,” comes a man’s voice from the office down the hall, “and if your truck isn’t here at
quote_last: , then the lot’ll be going to the Fine Fare depot in Aylesford.”
title: The Bone Clocks
author: David Mitchell

quote_last: . As he walked, he became aware of the echoing sound his feet made on the marble floor. It was then that he heard a voice say, “Do you wish to confess, my son?”
title: Sons of Fortune
author: Jeffrey Archer
